marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class QualityControl

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoiceImportComponent
      marytts.tools.voiceimport.QualityControl

public class QualityControl
extends VoiceImportComponent

Quality Control Component for Voice Import Tool to perform 'Sensibility check' on Data. It identifies some suspicious labels in label files generated from Automatic Labeling

Author:
Sathish Chandra Pammi
